scripts.build:image: pnpm --silent --workspace-root pnpm-context -- -p '**/tsconfig*.json' -p '.scripts/' packages/node/compositor/Dockerfile | docker image build --build-arg VCS_REF=`git rev-parse --short HEAD` --build-arg BUILD_DATE=`date -u +”%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ”` --build-arg PACKAGE_PATH=packages/node/compositor -t midspace/compositor -f Dockerfile -
scripts.start:image: mkdir -p build/temp && docker run --rm -it --mount type=bind,source="$(pwd)"/build/temp,target=/var/greenscreen --security-opt seccomp=src/resources/chrome.json --name=midspace-compositor midspace/compositor
scripts.clean: rimraf build && docker builder prune --filter type=exec.cachemount
